answer_text: Sonny Sangha is a prominent UK-based software developer, YouTuber, and coding mentor who specializes in teaching React.js and full-stack development, primarily through his "Zero to Full Stack Hero" community and the PAPAFAM developer group. linkedin 2+ Background and Career Sonny Sangha has over 10 years of coding experience, working with both startups and large corporations, including Tesco, Lindar Media, and Birdie. linkedin He founded "Zero to Full Stack Hero," an educational and mentorship program aimed at helping developers advance their skills through live coaching sessions, coding challenges, and resource libraries. papareact 1+ Sonny is known for his extensive tutorials and high-profile coding builds published on YouTube, where he has garnered over 260,000 subscribers and accumulated millions of views. x 1+ Community and Impact Sonny's PAPAFAM community is one of the largest developer groups online, with thousands of coders who have participated in mentorship, live streams, and challenges. instagram 1+ He regularly hosts coding bootcamps, SaaS and AI challenges, and releases free and premium content for developers at all skill levels. instagram 1+ Online Presence YouTube: Focuses on React.js basics, comprehensive coding tutorials, and real-world portfolio builds. youtube 1+ Instagram: Shares milestones about his career, developer community, and personal achievements. instagram GitHub: Hosts example builds and educational coding projects for public access. github Professional: Offers direct mentorship, premium resources, and personalized guidance for aspiring developers on Zero to Full Stack Hero. papareact 1+ Education Bachelor of Science in Computing (1st Class), and a Master of Science in Advanced Computer Science (Distinction) from University of Kent. compassionate-leakey-e9b16b.netlify 1+ Sonny Sangha is widely recognized for his inspirational and practical approach to developer education, touching the lives of thousands and continuously building resources to make coding, web development, and career progression more accessible. skool 2+
